first.mission: Development of innovative acoustic devices thanks to the continuous diligence in reasearch.
first.missionDesc:
Projects that have been relized by way of custom-made products, have made the difference in comparison to projects that have been relized with industrial products.
Wesakustik offers a large high quality selection of products for the acoustic insulation, absorption and diffusion.

company.title: Company
company.desc:
The Company was born in 2004 thanks to the experience started in 1999. Wesakustik is an expanding company in the acoustics field by way of a countinuous research and development.
The trigger of this process has been the awareness that, although the sound can be controlled by absorption, reflection and difussion process, the acoustic market is devoid of soundproof panels with high architectural rating. Most of the soundproof materials are often of industrial type with general characteristcs and no special aesthetic understandings and are not exploitable incase of special needs and refined settings.
Our personal practice has been developped in different fields as physics, music and electroacoustic devices technology, making possible the realization of specific products as: Schroeder loudspeaker system, Helmholtz resonator, reflecting systems, Bass Traps, all that customized in order to meet the different needs.
